```{r message=FALSE}
# region mobility report
library(readr)
region_mobility21 <- read_csv("~/Desktop/Stat 632/2021_US_Region_Mobility_Report.csv")

# subset dataframe range to CA only
ca_mobility21 <- subset(region_mobility21, sub_region_1 == "California")
ca_mobility.col <- ca_mobility21[,-c(5:8)]
ca_mobility.na <- na.omit(ca_mobility.col)
```


```{r}
# covid-19 report
library(COVID19)
covid <- covid19(
  country = "US",
  level = 2,
  start = "2020-04-10",
)
# subset dataframe to CA only
ca_covid <- subset(covid, administrative_area_level_2 == "California")
```


```{r}
# merge covid and google mobility report data
merge.dat <- merge(x= ca_mobility.na, y= ca_covid, by= 'date')
View(merge.dat)
```
